#### Import data (.csv, .txt, direct import)
```{r, eval=FALSE}
xxx.frm=read.table("xxx.txt",header=T)
attach(xxx.frm)
xxx.frm

xxx.frm=read.csv("xxx.csv")
attach(xxx.frm)
xxx.frm

data<-read.table(file.choose(),header=T)
```
